articles.description: India's overall exports (merchandise and services) in April-December 2020-21 were estimated at $348.49 billion, exhibiting a negative growth of 12.65 per cent over the same period last year.
articles.content: New Delhi: India's exports rose marginally to $27.15 billion in December 2020, while imports surged 7.56 per cent to $42.59 billion, official data showed on Friday. The merchandise exports were value… [+1733 chars]
